      • getFileName

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getFileName​(java.lang.String id)
        Tries to find the config file containing the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the ART config
        Returns:
        null if no config file containing the id was found. the absolute path to the config file if found.
